organization.content:

The "Organization" entities in the paragraph are:

1. FIFA (Fédération Internationale de Football Association)
2. AC Milan (Associazione Calcio Milan)
3. Porto (Futebol Clube do Porto)

2. AC Milan (Associazione Calcio Milan)
